entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sanirajak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:37 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -43.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sanirajak (Hall Beach Airport) 08:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -43.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 58 %
Wind Chill: -61
Dewpoint: -48.8°C
Wind: NW 21 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 41.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 41. Wind chill near minus 61. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill minus 61 this evening and minus 54 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
